<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157131</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3269</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Teaching the Poem "Fire and Ice"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Gedicht "Feuer und Eis" unterrichten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Enseignant la poésie le "feu et glace"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ensinando o poema "fogo e gelo"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Insegnando il poem "fuoco e ghiaccio"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διδασκαλικός το ποίημα "πυρκαγιά και πάγοσ"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Enseñando el poema "fuego e hielo"</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a short lesson plan to enable students to see how poetry illuminates the human condition, 
to expose them to modern American poetryand to encourage the students' own creativity. Includes samples of student poetry.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">literature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">poetry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein kurzer Lektionplan, zum der 
Kursteilnehmer zu aktivieren, zu sehen, wie Poesie den menschlichen 
Zustand belichtet, um sie modernem amerikanischem poetryand 
auszusetzen, um eigene Kreativität der Kursteilnehmer anzuregen. 
Enthält Proben von Kursteilnehmerpoesie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un plan court de leçon pour permettre à 
des étudiants de voir comment la poésie illumine l'état humain, 
pour les exposer au poetryand américain moderne pour encourager la 
propre créativité des étudiants. Inclut des échantillons de 
poésie d'étudiant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma planta curta da lição para permitir
estudantes de ver como a poesia ilumina a condição humana, para expo
os ao poetryand americano moderno para incentivar própria 
creatividade dos estudantes. Inclui amostras da poesia do 
estudante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un programma corto di lezione per 
permettere agli allievi di vedere come la poesia illumina lo stato 
umano, per esporli a poetryand americano moderno per consigliare alla 
propria creatività degli allievi. Include i campioni della 
poesia dell'allievo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα σύντομο σχέδιο μαθήματος για να 
επιτρέψει στους σπουδαστές για να δει πώς η ποίηση 
φωτίζει τον ανθρώπινο όρο, για να τους εκθέσει στο σύγχρονο 
αμερικανικό poetryand για να ενθαρρύνει τη δημιουργικότητα των 
σπουδαστών. Περιλαμβάνει τα δείγματα της ποίησης 
σπουδαστών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es un plan corto de la lección para 
permitir a estudiantes ver cómo la poesía ilumina la condición 
humana, para exponerlos al poetryand americano moderno para animar 
propia creatividad de los estudiantes. Incluye muestras de la 
poesía del estudiante.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Literatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Poesie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">littérature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">poésie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">poesia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">letteratura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">poesia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione scritta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λογοτεχνία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
